title: Hot Buffalo Chicken, Bacon, and Cheese Sandwich

Ingredients.5: 1 loaf Italian bread, cut in half lengthwise

Ingredients.6: 3 cups shredded meat from a rotisserie chicken

Ingredients.8: 0.25 cup roasted red bell peppers, drained and sliced (Optional)

Directions.1: Preheat an oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C).

Directions.2: Place the bacon in a large, deep skillet; cook over medium-high heat, turning occasionally, until evenly browned. Drain the bacon slices on a paper towel-lined plate.

Directions.3: Combine the mayonnaise, sour cream, and hot sauce in a small bowl. Spread both halves of the bread with the mayonnaise mixture. Place chicken on bottom half of bread; layer bacon and cheese on top of chicken. Fold the top half of the bread over the bottom, and wrap with foil.

Directions.4: Bake for 20 to 25 minutes. Add a layer of red pepper slices on top of the bacon and cheese, if desired. Cut into slices, and serve.
